name: DailySignal
text: RT @AjitPaiFCC: "I told them, 'I'm gonna be the best dishwasher you've ever had, because I want to be here, because I need to be with him.'" To visit husband, who has #Alzheimers, woman takes job at treatment center, which ended visitations due to #COVID19. H/T @paconner https://t.co/zIVVFKsQLY
